mapper.select: select idx, title, content, to_char(w_date, 'MM-DD hh:mi') as w_date, nickname, b.b_code, t.b_name, label, u_idx from board_${url} b join board_type_${url} t on b.b_code = t.b_code where title = #{title} and u_idx = #{u_idx} and content = #{content}

SELECT * FROM board_${url} a left outer JOIN doc_storage_${url} b ON a.idx = b.idx left outer JOIN common_board_${url} c ON a.idx = c.idx left outer JOIN board_status_${url} d ON a.idx = d.idx left outer JOIN calendar_${url} e ON e.idx = a.idx left outer JOIN kanban_${url} f ON f.idx = d.idx
WHERE a.title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR a.content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY a.idx DESC

select c_idx, a.u_idx, a.idx, a.nickname, title, content, w_date, b_code, label, b_name from checked_${url} c full outer join (select idx, nickname, title, content, to_char(w_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as w_date, b.b_code, label, u_idx, b_name from board_${url} b join board_type_${url} t on b.b_code = t.b_code) a on c.idx = a.idx
where c_idx is null
order by a.idx desc

select t.b_code, b_name, u_idx, profilephoto, nickname, title, content, w_date, label from board_type_${url} t join (select m.u_idx, profilephoto, m.nickname, title, content, to_char(w_date, 'MM-DD') as w_date, b_code, label from member m join board_${url} b on m.u_idx = b.u_idx where rownum <= 4) al on t.b_code = al.b_code

select c.c_idx, aa.idx, c.u_idx as u_idx1, aa.u_idx, profilephoto, nickname, title, content, w_date, b_code, label from (select c_idx, idx, u_idx from checked_${url} where u_idx = #{u_idx} ) c right join (select idx, m.u_idx, profilephoto, m.nickname, title, content, to_char(w_date, 'MM-DD') as w_date, b_code, label from member m join board_${url} b on m.u_idx = b.u_idx where rownum <= 4) aa on c.idx = aa.idx
